description.db:para: This table is used by the ACC module to report on transactions - accounted calls. More information is available at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;acc.html

column.name: method
column.description: A method is the primary function that a request is meant to invoke on a server.

column.name: from_tag
column.description: The tag parameter serves as a general mechanism to identify a dialog, which is the combination of the Call-ID along with two tags, one from participant in the dialog.

column.name: to_tag
column.description: The tag parameter serves as a general mechanism to identify a dialog, which is the combination of the Call-ID along with two tags, one from participant in the dialog.

column.name: callid
column.description: Call-ID header field uniquely identifies a particular invitation or all registrations of a particular client.

column.name: time
column.description: Date and time when this record was written.

column.name: duration
column.description: Call duration (from 200OK INVITE to BYE request) in seconds - this field is populated only if CDR support is enabled in ACC module (see cdr_flag parameter)

column.name: ms_duration
column.description: Call duration (from 200OK INVITE to BYE request) in milliseconds - this field is populated only if CDR support is enabled in ACC module (see cdr_flag parameter)

column.name: setuptime
column.description: Call initialization duration - (from INVITE request to 200 OK INVITE) - this filed is populated only if CDR support is enabled in ACC module (see cdr_flag parameter)

column.name: created
column.description: The call creation date and time.
